threat_description: Kafka topic configured with anonymous authentication allowing unauthorized access
Weak network segmentation allowing direct access to Kafka brokers from internet
Transitive dependency with critical vulnerability in Apache Commons library
Schema registry API exposed without authentication
Grafana dashboard with default admin credentials
Azure Storage account key exposed in Wiz scan
Consumer group credentials stored in plaintext configuration
Prometheus metrics endpoint exposing sensitive business data
Kafka encryption at rest not enabled for sensitive topics
Event replay system allows unauthorized data access
